response: "{ \"title\": \"Easy: Maximum Sum of Subarray\", \"description\": \"A subarray is a contiguous part of an array. Given a 1D integer array, find the maximum sum of a subarray within it.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef max_sum_subarray(arr: list[int)) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `arr` (list[int]): A 1D integer array with at least one element.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the maximum sum of a subarray within the input array.\", \"code\": \"def max_sum_subarray(arr: list[int)) -> int:\\n    if not arr:\\n        return 0\\n    max_sum = current_sum = arr[0]\\n    for num in arr[1:]:\\n        current_sum = max(num, current_sum + num)\\n        max_sum = max(max_sum, current_sum)\\n    return max_sum\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert max_sum_subarray([-2, 1, -3, 4, -1, 2, 1, -5, 4]) == 6\", \"assert max_sum_subarray([1, 2, -1, 3, 4, -1]) == 9\", \"assert max_sum_subarray([-1, 2, -3, 4, 0, 10, -12]) == 13\"] }"
